package.description: Provides capabilities (advanced IntelliSense, auto-fixing) in configuration files like settings, launch, and extension recommendation files.

dist/configurationEditingMain.workspaceFolder: The path of the folder opened in VS Code
dist/configurationEditingMain.workspaceFolderBasename: The name of the folder opened in VS Code without any slashes (/)
dist/configurationEditingMain.relativeFile: The current opened file relative to ${workspaceFolder}
dist/configurationEditingMain.relativeFileDirname: The current opened file's dirname relative to ${workspaceFolder}
dist/configurationEditingMain.cwd: The task runner's current working directory on startup
dist/configurationEditingMain.lineNumber: The current selected line number in the active file
dist/configurationEditingMain.selectedText: The current selected text in the active file
dist/configurationEditingMain.fileBasenameNoExtension: The current opened file's basename with no file extension
dist/configurationEditingMain.defaultBuildTask: The name of the default build task. If there is not a single default build task then a quick pick is shown to choose the build task.

dist/settingsDocumentHelper.activeEditor: Use the language of the currently active text editor if any
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.activeEditorMedium: the path of the file relative to the workspace folder (e.g. myFolder/myFileFolder/myFile.txt)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.activeEditorLong: the full path of the file (e.g. /Users/Development/myFolder/myFileFolder/myFile.txt)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.activeFolderShort: the name of the folder the file is contained in (e.g. myFileFolder)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.activeFolderMedium: the path of the folder the file is contained in, relative to the workspace folder (e.g. myFolder/myFileFolder)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.activeFolderLong: the full path of the folder the file is contained in (e.g. /Users/Development/myFolder/myFileFolder)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.rootName: name of the workspace (e.g. myFolder or myWorkspace)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.folderName: name of the workspace folder the file is contained in (e.g. myFolder)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.folderPath: file path of the workspace folder the file is contained in (e.g. /Users/Development/myFolder)
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.dirty: a dirty indicator if the active editor is dirty
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.separator: a conditional separator (' - ') that only shows when surrounded by variables with values
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.assocDescriptionFile: Map all files matching the glob pattern in their filename to the language with the given identifier.
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.assocDescriptionPath: Map all files matching the absolute path glob pattern in their path to the language with the given identifier.
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.fileDescription: Match all files of a specific file extension.
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.filesDescription: Match all files with any of the file extensions.
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.derivedDescription: Match files that have siblings with the same name but a different extension.
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.topFolderDescription: Match a top level folder with a specific name.
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.folderDescription: Match a folder with a specific name in any location.
dist/settingsDocumentHelper.siblingsDescription: Match files that have siblings with the same name but a different extension.
